refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls qbinom function defined on R which takes prob, the total number of samples and the success probability as input parameters and the result is the quantile binomial distribution value for the given prob.

listitem.para: prob : the probability value which is to be quantiled
n : the total number of samples

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls qbinom function defined on R which takes prob, the total number of samples and the success probability as input parameters and the result is the quantile binomial distribution value for the given prob.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // qbinom on prob, n, p y = qbinom(0.375,4,0.5)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
